Member Function Documentation

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::AbortReq (  const WString &  reason  ) 
 

Abort ongoing session.

The ongoing session is aborted and the user of the remote device is informed.

Parameters:
reason User friendly description why the session was aborted

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::ConnectReq (  BtBipSessionId  session_id,
const BtDevice &  device
) 
 

Connect to remote BIP device.

To connect to a remote device, first a device search has to be done. The selected device has then to be passed with this method to establish a BIP connection.

Parameters:
session_id Type of connection to establish, currently only BipImagePush and BipImagePull
device Device to connect to

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::DeleteImageReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl  ) 
 

Delete an image on remote device.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of image that shall be deleted.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::DisconnectReq (   ) 
 

Disconnect remote BIP device.

The connection to the remote device is disconnected.

BtBipResult BtBipClientService::GetBipResult (   ) 
 

Get BIP result code of last operation.

BtResultCode BtBipClientService::GetImageHdl (  BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl  ) 
 

Get the image handle.

An image handle is only available after a successful PutImageRequest.

Parameters:
img_hld A reference to a String.

BtResultCode BtBipClientService::GetImageProperties (  BtBipImagePropertiesPtr &  props  ) 
 

Get the properties of an image.

Image properties are only available after a successful GetImagePropertiesReqeust.

Parameters:
props A reference to BtBipImageProperites that will be filled with the result data.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::GetImagePropertiesReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl  ) 
 

Get the properties of an image.

The properites of an image contain information about native size, encoding, possible other sizes and attachments of an image.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of image to retrieve properties from.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::GetImageReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl,
const BtBipImageDescPtr &  img_desc,
const DataSinkPtr &  image
) 
 

Get an image from remote device.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of image to retrieve.
img_desc Descriptor of image that specifys the format the image should be retrieved in.
img Shared pointer to DataSink, where the received image data can be written to.

BtResultCode BtBipClientService::GetImagesList (  BtBipImageListPtr &  img_list  ) 
 

Get the image list.

An image list is only available after a successful GetImageListRequest.

Parameters:
img_list A reference to a BtBipImagesList that will be filled with the result data.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::GetImagesListReq (  UINT16  first_index,
UINT16  max_images,
BOOLEAN  sort_by_latest_first,
const BtBipImageHdlDescPtr &  filter
) 
 

Request a list of images available on remote device.

Parameters:
first_index Zero based index of image where the list should start.
max_images Max. number of images in list. Filter to restrict the images returned in list.

BtResultCode BtBipClientService::GetImagingCapabilites (  BtBipImagingCapabilitiesPtr &  caps  ) 
 

Get the imaging capabilities.

The imaging capabilites are only available after a GetImagingCapabilitiesRequest has been processed successfully.

Parameters:
caps A reference to a BtBipImagingCapabilities instance. This instance will be filled with the data

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::GetImagingCapabilitiesReq (   ) 
 

Get the imaging capabilities of the remote device.

The imaging capabilities give information about which sort of images the remote device is able to cope with.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::GetLinkedAttachmentReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl,
const WString &  file_name,
const DataSinkPtr &  attach
) 
 

Get an attachment from remote device.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of image of which an attachment is to be retrieved.
file_name Filename of the attachment that should be retrieved.
attach Shared pointer to DataSink, where the received attachment can be written to.

Parameters:

img_desc Descriptor of image that specifys the format the image should be retrieved in.

UINT32 BtBipClientService::GetProgressInBytes (   )  [inline]
 

Get the Bytes already transfered in the current request.

If no Get or PUT request is running 0 Bytes are returned

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::PutImageReq (  const WString &  name,
const ImageObtainer &  image
) 
 

Send an image to the remote device.

While sending the data is read from img. After sending finished, the result of the operation has to be checked with GetResult(). If BIP_RESULT_PARTIAL_CONTENT is returned, the thumbnail of the just sent image has to be sent to the remote device. The handle of the sent image can be retrieved with GetImageHandle().

Parameters:
image ImageObtainer of the image.
Returns:

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::PutImageReq (  const WString &  name,
BtBipImageDescPtr &  img_desc,
const ImageObtainer &  image
) 
 

Send an image to the remote device.

While sending the data is read from img. After sending finished, the result of the operation has to be checked with GetResult(). If BIP_RESULT_PARTIAL_CONTENT is returned, the thumbnail of the just sent image has to be sent to the remote device. The handle of the sent image can be retrieved with GetImageHandle().

Parameters:
image ImageObtainer of the image.
img_desc Shared pointer to BtBipImageDesc that is used for sending the image.
Returns:

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::PutImageReq (  const WString &  name,
const BtBipImageDescPtr &  img_desc,
const DataSourcePtr &  img
) 
 

Send an image to the remote device.

While sending the data is read from img. After sending finished, the result of the operation has to be checked with GetResult(). If BIP_RESULT_PARTIAL_CONTENT is returned, the thumbnail of the just sent image has to be sent to the remote device. The handle of the sent image can be retrieved with GetImageHandle().

Parameters:
name Image name.
img_desc Image descriptor, that defines the image's properties.
img Binary image data.
Returns:

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::PutLinkedAttachmentReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl,
const BtBipAttachmentDescPtr &  attach_desc,
const DataSourcePtr &  attach
) 
 

Send an attachment to the remote device.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of the image the attachment belongs to.
img_desc Image descriptor, that defines the image's properties.
attachment Binay attachment data.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::PutLinkedThumbnailReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl,
const DataSourcePtr &  thumb
) 
 

Send a thumbnail of an image to the remote device.

A thumbnail can be sent any time, but it has to be sent after a Put Image request, if the result of the Put Image request is BIP_RESULT_PARTIAL_CONTENT.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of the image the thumbnail belongs to.
thumbnail Binary thumbnail image data.

BtRequestState BtBipClientService::PutLinkedThumbnailReq (  const BtBipImageHdlPtr &  img_hdl,
const ImageObtainer &  thumb
) 
 

Send a thumbnail of an image to the remote device.

A thumbnail can be sent any time, but it has to be sent after a Put Image request, if the result of the Put Image request is BIP_RESULT_PARTIAL_CONTENT.

Parameters:
img_hdl Handle of the image the thumbnail belongs to.
thumbnail Binary ImageObtainer of image thumbnail.
